title: High Rhulain
description: THE NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLERA thrilling Redwall adventure from beloved author Brian Jacques.Tiria Wildlough, a young ottermaid touched by the paw of destiny, embarks on a journey to the mysterious Green Isle, where she joins a band of outlaw otters to rid the land of the villainous Wildcat chieftain Riggu Fellis and his catguard slave mastersâ€¦
author: Brian Jacques
